events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle against a parked car on March 30th at 8 PM.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords matching vehicle collision and damage.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer with all necessary claim processes.
The claim was formally acknowledged and the claimant was informed that the process will begin shortly.
Customer was requested to provide photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report from the accident.
Customer successfully submitted the required photos and the official police report for review.
The investigation team began assessing the submitted evidence to verify the vehicle damage details.
Investigation concluded confirming the extent of damage matched the reported collision circumstances.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs was proposed to the claimant for approval.
The customer responded positively accepting the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction.
The claim was officially approved following the customer acceptance of the settlement proposal.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account promptly.
The claim was formally closed after confirmation of payment delivery and customer satisfaction.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived in accordance with company policies.
